thread.title: Excelent deal
thread.title_full: Excelent deal - Review of Hotel Boutique At Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JulioCesarNascimento
title: Excelent deal
text: It was not my first time in NY, but it was my first time in this hotel. I think it is perfect for those who are looking for good service and faire price. Excelent location. You wil realize that as the hotel is just one block from Central Station you can easealy move by subway faster with out so many conections.
